original_text: Jason has let them stay in his house. They speak against the laws that Caesar has given to us. They say that there is another king. This other king is called Jesus.’
korean_text: 야손이 그들을 맞아 들였도다 이 사람들이 다 가이사의 명을 거역하여 말하되 다른 임금 곧 예수라 하는 이가 있다 하더이다 하니

sentences.original_text: Jason has let them stay in his house
sentences.korean_translation: 이손이 그들을 자기 집에 머물게 했습니다

sentences.original_text: that Caesar has given to us
sentences.korean_translation: 그 법은 카이사르가 우리에게 준 것입니다

sentences.original_text: They say that there is another king
This other king is called Jesus
